description: System-generated unique identifier for a work order assignment record.
Identifier of the work order to which this assignment belongs.
Identifier of the person, technician, or team assigned to the work order. Likely a user/employee ID; confirm with SME.
Boolean flag indicating the primary assignee when multiple assignees exist.
User identifier of who last changed this assignment; likely legacy or redundant; confirm with SME.
Timestamp when this assignment record was last updated; may duplicate other modified timestamp fields; confirm with SME.
User identifier for the last modifier of this record; likely redundant; confirm with SME.
User identifier that created this assignment record.
Date and time the assignment record was created.
User identifier that last modified this assignment record.
Date and time the assignment record was last modified.
